text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the French company cannot legally act as the EU Exporter under EXW terms for customs purposes. The response explicitly advises against the French company becoming the de-facto IOR and instead recommends setting up a UK-based 'import-facilitator' (a UK limited company or branch) to act as the IOR. This structure inherently prevents the French parent from acting as the declarant/IOR to HMRC, which is the operational consequence of the legal constraint mentioned in the criterion.", "criterion_id": "cf77364d-885c-4118-9665-e75f304c088a"}
